text:
Hi there, we (mobileforce) have an app on the HubSpot marketplace, which  many customers have been using for years.

just a couple hours ago 3 of our customers reported the same error which in HubSpot javascript code:

The error is a javascript error in HubSpot’s OAuth authorization page (<https://app.HubSpot.com/oauth/9190475/authorize>).

*Since the error is in HubSpot’s code, I do not know how to proceed.  Any hints?*

Because of this error, embedded access is broken for all HubSpot accounts for new users.

raven.js:371 Uncaught TypeError: Cannot read properties of undefined (reading ‘indexOf’)
   at l (project-hubless.js:1:78372)
   at d (project-hubless.js:1:78544)
   at b (project-hubless.js:1:79100)
   at o (raven.js:367:21)
